TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Strings extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于执行字符串操作的过程。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform string operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和操作字符串的运行时库成员。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that manipulate strings. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将字符串的空格处拆分。The following example demonstrates how to split a string at its spaces. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

summary.span: 返回一个 值，该值表示与某个字符相对应的字符代码。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

Public Function Asc (String As Char) As Integer
public: static int Asc(char String);

param.name: String
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 任何有效的 或 表达式。

span.span: Any valid or expression.

param.span: 如果 String 是一个 表达式，则只将字符串的第一个字符用于输入。

span.span: If String is a expression, only the first character of the string is used for input.

summary.span: 返回一个 值，该值表示与某个字符相对应的字符代码。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

returns.span: 返回一个 值，该值表示与某个字符相对应的字符代码。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Asc` 返回*代码点*，或输入的字符的字符代码。`Asc` returns the *code point*, or character code, for the input character. 这可以是 0 到 255 的单字节字符集 (SBCS) 值和-32768 到 32767 之间的双字节字符集 (dbcs) 值。This can be 0 through 255 for single-byte character set (SBCS) values and -32768 through 32767 for double-byte character set (DBCS) values. `AscW` 返回输入的字符的 Unicode 码位。`AscW` returns the Unicode code point for the input character. 这可以是 0 到 65535 之间。This can be 0 through 65535. 返回的值是独立于当前线程的区域性和代码页设置。The returned value is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread. > [!NOTE] > `AscB`的 Visual Basic 早期版本的函数返回一个字节，而不是一个字符的代码。The `AscB` function of earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a code for a byte, rather than a character. 它主要用于在双字节字符集 (DBCS) 应用程序中转换字符串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有 Visual Basic 2005 字符串都都以 unicode 格式，和`AscB`不再受支持。All Visual Basic 2005 strings are in Unicode, and `AscB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Asc`函数以返回`Integer`字符对应于每个字符串中的第一个字母的代码。The following example uses the `Asc` function to return `Integer` character codes corresponding to the first letter in each string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static char Chr (int CharCode);
.method public static char Chr(int32 CharCode) cil managed
Public Function Chr (CharCode As Integer) As Char
public: static char Chr(int CharCode);

param.name: CharCode
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 表达式，表示字符的 code point 或字符代码。

span.span: An expression representing the code point, or character code, for the character.

summary.span: 返回与指定字符代码相关联的字符。

span.span: Returns the character associated with the specified character code.

returns.span: 返回与指定字符代码相关联的字符。

span.span: Returns the character associated with the specified character code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非对称的范围已接受的针对`CharCode`补偿存储之间的差异`Short`和`Integer`。The asymmetric range accepted for `CharCode` compensates for the storage differences between the `Short` and the `Integer`. 例如，-29183 是`Short`但 + 36353 为`Integer`。For example, -29183 is a `Short` but +36353 is an `Integer`. 这也便于与 Visual Basic 6.0 兼容性。This also facilitates compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0. `Chr` 使用类命名空间，以确定当前线程是否使用单字节字符集 (SBCS) 或双字节字符设置 (DBCS)。`Chr` uses the class in the namespace to determine if the current thread is using a single-byte character set (SBCS) or a double-byte character set (DBCS). 这就需要花费`CharCode`作为代码点中相应的一组。It then takes `CharCode` as a code point in the appropriate set. 范围可以是 0 到 255 SBCS 字符和-32768 到 65535 的 DBCS 字符。The range can be 0 through 255 for SBCS characters and -32768 through 65535 for DBCS characters. 返回的值取决于当前线程中包含的代码页属性类命名空间。The returned value depends on the code page for the current thread, which is contained in the property of the class in the namespace. 你可以获取通过指定`System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`。You can obtain by specifying `System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`. `ChrW` 采用`CharCode`为 Unicode 码位。`ChrW` takes `CharCode` as a Unicode code point. 范围是独立于当前线程的区域性和代码页设置。The range is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread. 32768 到-1 的值的处理方式范围 32768 到方式中的值相同。Values from -32768 through -1 are treated the same as values in the range +32768 through +65535. 从 0 到 31 的数字是标准不能打印的 ASCII 代码相同。Numbers from 0 through 31 are the same as standard nonprintable ASCII codes. 例如，`Chr(10)`返回以换行符。For example, `Chr(10)` returns a line feed character. > [!NOTE] > `ChrB`在早期版本的 Visual Basic 中的函数返回一个字节。The `ChrB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a single byte. 它主要用于在双字节字符集 (DBCS) 应用程序中转换字符串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. Visual Basic 和.NET Framework 中的所有字符串都都以 unicode 格式，和`ChrB`不再受支持。All strings in Visual Basic and the .NET Framework are in Unicode, and `ChrB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Chr`函数以返回与指定的字符代码关联的字符。The following example uses the `Chr` function to return the character associated with the specified character code. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有匹配项的`Match`内找到`Source`、`Filter`函数返回一个空数组。If no matches of `Match` are found within `Source`, the `Filter` function returns an empty array. 如果发生错误`Source`设置为`Nothing`或不是一维数组。An error occurs if `Source` is set to `Nothing` or is not a one-dimensional array. 返回的数组`Filter`函数仅包含足够的元素以包含匹配项的数目。The array returned by the `Filter` function contains only enough elements to contain the number of matched items. `Compare`自变量可以具有下列值。The `Compare` argument can have the following values. |返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|执行二进制比较Performs a binary comparison| |`CompareMethod.Text`|执行文本比较Performs a textual comparison| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Filter`函数。This example demonstrates the use of the `Filter` function. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有匹配项的`Match`内找到`Source`、`Filter`函数返回一个空数组。If no matches of `Match` are found within `Source`, the `Filter` function returns an empty array. 如果发生错误`Source`设置为`Nothing`或不是一维数组。An error occurs if `Source` is set to `Nothing` or is not a one-dimensional array. 返回的数组`Filter`函数仅包含足够的元素以包含匹配项的数目。The array returned by the `Filter` function contains only enough elements to contain the number of matched items. `Compare`自变量可以具有下列值。The `Compare` argument can have the following values. |返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|执行二进制比较Performs a binary comparison| |`CompareMethod.Text`|执行文本比较Performs a textual comparison| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Filter`函数。This example demonstrates the use of the `Filter` function. remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法还提供了类似的功能。The method also provides similar functionality. 如果你设置非本地化的数值字符串格式时，应使用用户定义的数值格式来确保你获取所需的外观。If you are formatting a nonlocalized numeric string, you should use a user-defined numeric format to ensure that you get the look you want. 如果你尝试将数字格式而无需指定`Style`、`Format`函数提供了功能类似于`Str`函数，但它是国际上感知。If you try to format a number without specifying `Style`, the `Format` function provides functionality similar to the `Str` function, although it is internationally aware. 但是，正数格式化为字符串使用`Format`函数不包含前导空格保留为的符号的值; 这些转换使用`Str`函数将前导的空间保留。However, positive numbers formatted as strings using the `Format` function don't include a leading space reserved for the sign of the value; those converted using the `Str` function retain the leading space. ## 不同的数字值的不同格式Different Formats for Different Numeric Values 数字的用户定义的格式表达式可以介于 1 到用分号分隔的三个部分。A user-defined format expression for numbers can have from one to three sections separated by semicolons. 如果`Style`参数`Format`函数包含预定义的数值格式之一，允许只有一节。If the `Style` argument of the `Format` function contains one of the predefined numeric formats, only one section is allowed. |如果你使用If you use|下面是结果This is the result| |-|-| |仅一个部分One section only|格式表达式应用于所有值。The format expression applies to all values.| |两个部分Two sections|第一部分应用于正值和零;第二个应用于负值。The first section applies to positive values and zeros; the second applies to negative values.| |三个部分Three sections|第一部分应用于正值，第二个应用于负值，第三个应用于零。The first section applies to positive values, the second applies to negative values, and the third applies to zeros.| 下面的示例有两个部分： 第一个定义正值和零; 的格式第二部分定义负值的格式。The following example has two sections: the first defines the format for positive values and zeros; the second section defines the format for negative values. 由于`Style`参数`Format`函数采用字符串形式，它用引号引起来。Since the `Style` argument of the `Format` function takes a string, it is enclosed by quotation marks. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#18)] 如果你包含分号它们之间没有任何内容，则缺少的部分将打印使用的正数值的格式。If you include semicolons with nothing between them, the missing section is printed using the format of the positive value. 例如，以下格式显示正值和负值值的第一节中使用的格式并显示`Zero`如果值为零。For example, the following format displays positive and negative values using the format in the first section and displays `Zero` if the value is zero. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#19)] ## 预定义的数值格式Predefined Numeric Formats 下表标识预定义数字格式的名称。The following table identifies the predefined numeric format names. 名称为可能使用这些`Style`参数`Format`函数：These may be used by name as the `Style` argument for the `Format` function: |格式名称Format name|描述Description| |-|-| |`General Number`、`G` 或 `g``General Number`, `G`, or `g`|显示带没有千位分隔符的数字。Displays number with no thousand separator.

例如，`Format(&H3FA, "g")`返回`1018`。For example, `Format(&H3FA, "g")` returns `1018`.| |`Currency`、`C` 或 `c``Currency`, `C`, or `c`|显示带千位分隔符的数字，根据;小数点分隔符右侧显示两个数字。Displays number with thousand separator, if appropriate; displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator. 输出基于系统区域设置。Output is based on system locale settings.

例如，`Format(1234567, "c")`返回`$1,234,567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "c")` returns `$1,234,567.00`.| |`Fixed`、`F` 或 `f``Fixed`, `F`, or `f`|显示的小数分隔符右侧左侧的至少一个数字和两个数字。Displays at least one digit to the left and two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(1234567, "f")`返回`1234567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "f")` returns `1234567.00`.| |`Standard`、`N` 或 `n``Standard`, `N`, or `n`|小数点分隔符右侧显示带千位分隔符左侧至少一个数字的两个数字的数量。Displays number with thousand separator, at least one digit to the left and two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(1234567, "n")`返回`1,234,567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "n")` returns `1,234,567.00`.| |`Percent`|将数字乘以 100 百分号 （%） 立即追加到右侧显示; 始终显示两个数字的小数点分隔符右侧。Displays number multiplied by 100 with a percent sign (%) appended immediately to the right; always displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(0.4744, "Percent")`返回`47.44%`。For example, `Format(0.4744, "Percent")` returns `47.44%`.| |`P`或 `p``P`, or `p`|将数字显示乘以 100 百分号 （%） 追加到右部和分隔加一个空格的千分位分隔符; 始终显示两个数字的小数点分隔符右侧。Displays number with thousandths separator multiplied by 100 with a percent sign (%) appended to the right and separated by a single space; always displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(0.80345, "p")`返回`80.35 %`。For example, `Format(0.80345, "p")` returns `80.35 %`.| |`Scientific`|使用标准的科学记数法，提供两个有效位。Uses standard scientific notation, providing two significant digits.

例如，`Format(1234567, "Scientific")`返回`1.23E+06`。For example, `Format(1234567, "Scientific")` returns `1.23E+06`.| |`E`或 `e``E`, or `e`|使用标准的科学记数法，提供六个有效位。Uses standard scientific notation, providing six significant digits.

例如，`Format(1234567, "e")`返回`1.234567e+006`。For example, `Format(1234567, "e")` returns `1.234567e+006`.| |`D`或 `d``D`, or `d`|数字显示为包含十进制 (基数为 10) 格式数的值的字符串。Displays number as a string that contains the value of the number in Decimal (base 10) format. 整型支持此选项 (`Byte`， `Short`， `Integer`， `Long`) 仅。This option is supported for integral types (`Byte`, `Short`, `Integer`, `Long`) only.

例如，`Format(&H7F, "d")`返回`127`。For example, `Format(&H7F, "d")` returns `127`.| |`X`或 `x``X`, or `x`|数字显示为包含十六进制 (以 16 为基数) 格式的数字的值的字符串。Displays number as a string that contains the value of the number in Hexadecimal (base 16) format. 整型支持此选项 (`Byte`， `Short`， `Integer`， `Long`) 仅。This option is supported for integral types (`Byte`, `Short`, `Integer`, `Long`) only.

例如，`Format(127, "x")`返回`7f`。For example, `Format(127, "x")` returns `7f`.| |`Yes/No`|显示`No`如果数字为 0; 否则为将显示`Yes`。Displays `No` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `Yes`.

例如，`Format(0, "Yes/No")`返回`No`。For example, `Format(0, "Yes/No")` returns `No`.| |`True/False`|显示`False`如果数字为 0; 否则为将显示`True`。Displays `False` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `True`.

例如，`Format(1, "True/False")`返回`True`。For example, `Format(1, "True/False")` returns `True`.| |`On/Off`|显示`Off`如果数字为 0; 否则为将显示`On`。Displays `Off` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `On`.

例如，`Format(1, "On/Off")`返回`On`。For example, `Format(1, "On/Off")` returns `On`.| ### 智能设备的开发人员说明Smart Device Developer Notes `Yes/No`， `True/False`，和`On/Off`不支持格式。The `Yes/No`, `True/False`, and `On/Off` formats are not supported. ## 用户定义的数值格式User-Defined Numeric Formats 下表标识了可用于创建用户定义数字格式的字符。The following table identifies characters you can use to create user-defined number formats. 这些可用于生成`Style`参数`Format`函数：These may be used to build the `Style` argument for the `Format` function: |字符Character|描述Description| |-|-| |无None|显示不带格式的数量。Displays the number with no formatting.| |(`0`)(`0`)|数字占位符。Digit placeholder. 显示一个数字或零。Displays a digit or a zero. 如果表达式中的格式字符串中出现零的位置有一个数字，显示它;否则，将显示在该位置零。If the expression has a digit in the position where the zero appears in the format string, display it; otherwise, displays a zero in that position.

如果数字位数少于在格式表达式中，显示前导空格或尾随零是零 （小数点任意一侧）。If the number has fewer digits than there are zeros (on either side of the decimal) in the format expression, displays leading or trailing zeros. 如果数字位数比小数点分隔符右侧，有零格式表达式中小数点分隔符右侧将向上舍入到多个数字的小数位数与零。If the number has more digits to the right of the decimal separator than there are zeros to the right of the decimal separator in the format expression, rounds the number to as many decimal places as there are zeros. 如果数字位数比小数点分隔符左侧有零格式表达式中小数点分隔符左侧显示多余的数字，而无需修改。If the number has more digits to the left of the decimal separator than there are zeros to the left of the decimal separator in the format expression, displays the extra digits without modification.| |(`#`)(`#`)|数字占位符。Digit placeholder. 显示一个数字或执行任何操作。Displays a digit or nothing. 如果表达式的位置有一个数字其中`#`字符将显示在格式字符串中，将其显示; 否则，在该位置显示执行任何操作。If the expression has a digit in the position where the `#` character appears in the format string, displays it; otherwise, displays nothing in that position.

此符号的工作原理类似`0`数字占位符，但的前导空格和尾随零不显示如果数字位数多于少于`#`两侧的格式表达式中小数点分隔符的字符。This symbol works like the `0` digit placeholder, except that leading and trailing zeros aren't displayed if the number has fewer digits than there are `#` characters on either side of the decimal separator in the format expression.| |(`.`)(`.`)|小数点占位符。Decimal placeholder. 小数点占位符确定小数点分隔符左侧和右侧显示几位数。The decimal placeholder determines how many digits are displayed to the left and right of the decimal separator. 格式表达式仅包含`#`此符号左侧的字符; 小于 1 开头小数分隔符的数字。If the format expression contains only `#` characters to the left of this symbol; numbers smaller than 1 begin with a decimal separator. 若要显示前导零与小数一起显示，请使用零作为小数点分隔符左侧的第一个数字占位符。To display a leading zero displayed with fractional numbers, use zero as the first digit placeholder to the left of the decimal separator. 在某些区域设置中，逗号用作小数分隔符。In some locales, a comma is used as the decimal separator. 用作在格式化输出中的小数点占位符的实际字符取决于你的系统所识别的数字格式。The actual character used as a decimal placeholder in the formatted output depends on the number format recognized by your system. 因此，你应该使用段作为小数点占位符中你格式即使你在使用逗号作为小数点占位符的区域。Thus, you should use the period as the decimal placeholder in your formats even if you are in a locale that uses a comma as a decimal placeholder. 带格式的字符串将出现在区域设置的正确格式。The formatted string will appear in the format correct for the locale.| |(`%`)(`%`)|百分比占位符。Percent placeholder. 表达式乘以 100。Multiplies the expression by 100. 百分比字符 (`%`) 插入在格式字符串中出现的位置。The percent character (`%`) is inserted in the position where it appears in the format string.| |(`,`)(`,`)|千位分隔符。Thousand separator. 千位分隔符分隔千位和百具有四个或多个位数的小数点分隔符左侧的数字中。The thousand separator separates thousands from hundreds within a number that has four or more places to the left of the decimal separator. 在指定的千位分隔符的标准用法如果格式中包含的千位分隔符括在数字占位符 (`0`或`#`)。Standard use of the thousand separator is specified if the format contains a thousand separator surrounded by digit placeholders (`0` or `#`).

立即向左小数点分隔符 （无论指定小数） 或作为最右边的千位分隔符中的字符的字符串方式"来缩放数除以 1000，根据需要舍入。"A thousand separator immediately to the left of the decimal separator (whether or not a decimal is specified) or as the rightmost character in the string means "scale the number by dividing it by 1,000, rounding as needed." 小于 1000 但大于或等于 500 的数字显示为`1`，和数字小于 500 显示为`0`。Numbers smaller than 1,000 but greater or equal to 500 are displayed as `1`, and numbers smaller than 500 are displayed as `0`. 两个相邻的千位分隔符，在此位置中的缩放量的 100 万个因素和每增加一个分隔符的 1,000 个的其他因素。Two adjacent thousand separators in this position scale by a factor of 1 million, and an additional factor of 1,000 for each additional separator.

小数点分隔符左侧以外的其他任何位置或字符串中最右边的位置中的多个分隔符将被视为只需指定使用千位分隔符。Multiple separators in any position other than immediately to the left of the decimal separator or the rightmost position in the string are treated simply as specifying the use of a thousand separator. 在某些区域设置，一段时间用作千位分隔符。In some locales, a period is used as a thousand separator. 用作千位分隔符在格式化输出中的实际字符取决于你的系统所识别的数字格式。The actual character used as the thousand separator in the formatted output depends on the Number Format recognized by your system. 因此，你应该使用逗号作为千位分隔符中你格式即使你在使用句点作为千位分隔符的区域。Thus, you should use the comma as the thousand separator in your formats even if you are in a locale that uses a period as a thousand separator. 带格式的字符串将出现在区域设置的正确格式。The formatted string will appear in the format correct for the locale.

例如，考虑三个以下的格式字符串：For example, consider the three following format strings:

- `"#,0."`以数字 1 亿格式化为字符串"100000000"的使用千位分隔符。- `"#,0."`, which uses the thousands separator to format the number 100 million as the string "100,000,000".
- `"#0,."`它使用按一千系数缩放数字 1 亿个格式化为字符串"100000"。- `"#0,."`, which uses scaling by a factor of one thousand to format the number 100 million as the string "100000".
- `"#,0,."`使用千位分隔符和数字 1 亿格式化为字符串"100000"一千缩放。- `"#,0,."`, which uses the thousands separator and scaling by one thousand to format the number 100 million as the string "100,000".| |(`:`)(`:`)|时间分隔符。Time separator. 在某些区域设置，可能用其他字符来表示时间分隔符。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the time separator. 时间分隔符用于分隔小时、 分钟和秒为单位设置时间值的格式。The time separator separates hours, minutes, and seconds when time values are formatted. 用作时间分隔符在格式化输出中的实际字符是由您的系统设置确定的。The actual character used as the time separator in formatted output is determined by your system settings.| |(`/`)(`/`)|日期分隔符。Date separator. 在某些区域设置，可能用其他字符来表示日期分隔符。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the date separator. 日期分隔符分隔设置日期值格式时日、 月和年。The date separator separates the day, month, and year when date values are formatted. 用作日期分隔符在格式化输出中的实际字符取决通过您的系统设置。The actual character used as the date separator in formatted output is determined by your system settings.| |(`E-``E+``e-``e+`)(`E-``E+``e-``e+`)|科学记数格式。Scientific format. 如果格式表达式中，包含至少一个数字占位符 (`0`或`#`) 的左侧`E-`， `E+`， `e-`，或`e+`，科学记数格式中显示的数量和`E`或`e`数和其指数之间插入。If the format expression contains at least one digit placeholder (`0` or `#`) to the left of `E-`, `E+`, `e-`, or `e+`, the number is displayed in scientific format and `E` or `e` is inserted between the number and its exponent. 左侧的数字占位符的个数确定指数中的数字个数。The number of digit placeholders to the left determines the number of digits in the exponent. 使用`E-`或`e-`放置负指数的后面一个减号。Use `E-` or `e-` to place a minus sign next to negative exponents. 使用`E+`或`e+`放置负指数的后面一个减号和正指数的后面一个加号。Use `E+` or `e+` to place a minus sign next to negative exponents and a plus sign next to positive exponents. 您还必须包含数字占位符到此符号的右侧，以获取正确的格式设置。You must also include digit placeholders to the right of this symbol to get correct formatting.| |`-` `+` `$` ( )`-` `+` `$` ( )|原义字符。Literal characters. 这些字符格式字符串中键入的形式显示。These characters are displayed exactly as typed in the format string. 若要显示的字符不是列出的那些之一是，它前面加上反斜杠 (`\`) 或将其放在双引号 ("")。To display a character other than one of those listed, precede it with a backslash (`\`) or enclose it in double quotation marks (" ").| |(`\`)(`\`)|格式字符串中显示的下一个字符。Displays the next character in the format string. 若要显示具有特殊含义与原义字符的字符，它前面加上反斜杠 (`\`)。To display a character that has special meaning as a literal character, precede it with a backslash (`\`). 反斜杠本身未显示。The backslash itself isn't displayed. 使用反斜杠等同于将括在双引号中的下一个字符。Using a backslash is the same as enclosing the next character in double quotation marks. 若要显示一个反斜杠，请使用两个反斜杠 (`\\`)。To display a backslash, use two backslashes (`\\`).

无法显示为原义字符分别为日期格式设置和时间格式字符的字符的示例 (`a`， `c`， `d`， `h`， `m`， `n`， `p`， `q`， `s`， `t`， `w`， `y`， `/`，和`:`)，数字格式字符 (`#`， `0`， `%`， `E`， `e`，逗号和句点)，和字符串格式设置字符 (`@`， `&`， `<`， `>`，和`!`)。Examples of characters that can't be displayed as literal characters are the date-formatting and time-formatting characters (`a`, `c`, `d`, `h`, `m`, `n`, `p`, `q`, `s`, `t`, `w`, `y`, `/`, and `:`), the numeric-formatting characters (`#`, `0`, `%`, `E`, `e`, comma, and period), and the string-formatting characters (`@`, `&`, `<`, `>`, and `!`).| |(`"``ABC``"`)(`"``ABC``"`)|显示两个双引号内的字符串 ("")。Displays the string inside the double quotation marks (" "). 若要在代码中样式参数中包含一个字符串，必须使用`Chr(34)`来包含文本 (`34`是引号 （"） 的字符代码)。To include a string in the style argument from within code, you must use `Chr(34)` to enclose the text (`34` is the character code for a quotation mark (")).| ### 旧式代码示例Legacy Code Example 下表包含数字某些示例格式表达式。The following table contains some sample format expressions for numbers. （所有这些示例假定你的系统区域设置设置为英语-美国）第一列包含的格式字符串`Style`参数`Format`函数; 这些其他列包含所生成的输出，如果格式化的数据具有列标题中给定的值。(These examples all assume that your system's locale setting is English-U.S.) The first column contains the format strings for the `Style` argument of the `Format` function; the other columns contain the resulting output if the formatted data has the value given in the column headings. |格式 (`Style`)Format (`Style`)|"5"的格式设置为"5" formatted as|"-5"的格式设置为"-5" formatted as|"0.5"格式化为"0.5" formatted as| |-|-|-|-| |`Zero-length string ("")`|`5`|`-5`|`0.5`| |`0`|`5`|`-5`|`1`| |`0.00`|`5.00`|`-5.00`|`0.50`| |`#,##0`|`5`|`-5`|`1`| |`$#,##0;($#,##0)`|`$5`|`($5)`|`$1`| |`$#,##0.00;($#,##0.00)`|`$5.00`|`($5.00)`|`$0.50`| |`0%`|`500%`|`-500%`|`50%`| |`0.00%`|`500.00%`|`-500.00%`|`50.00%`| |`0.00E+00`|`5.00E+00`|`-5.00E+00`|`5.00E-01`| |`0.00E-00`|`5.00E00`|`-5.00E00`|`5.00E-01`| ## 预定义的日期/时间格式Predefined Date/Time Formats 下表标识预定义的日期和时间格式的名称。The following table identifies the predefined date and time format names. 这些可能由名称用作的样式参数`Format`函数：These may be used by name as the style argument for the `Format` function: |格式名称Format Name|描述Description| |-|-| |`General Date`或 `G``General Date`, or `G`|显示日期和/或时间。Displays a date and/or time. 例如 `3/12/2008 11:07:31 AM`。For example, `3/12/2008 11:07:31 AM`. 日期显示由应用程序的当前区域性值确定。Date display is determined by your application's current culture value.| |`Long Date`、`Medium Date` 或 `D``Long Date`, `Medium Date`, or `D`|日期，根据当前区域性的长日期格式显示。Displays a date according to your current culture's long date format. 例如 `Wednesday, March 12, 2008`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008`.| |`Short Date`或 `d``Short Date`, or `d`|显示使用当前区域性的短日期格式的日期。Displays a date using your current culture's short date format. 例如 `3/12/2008`。For example, `3/12/2008`.

`d`字符中的用户定义的日期格式显示日期。The `d` character displays the day in a user-defined date format.| |`Long Time`、`Medium Time` 或 `T``Long Time`, `Medium Time`, or `T`|使用当前区域性的长时间格式; 显示时间通常包括小时、 分钟、 秒。Displays a time using your current culture's long time format; typically includes hours, minutes, seconds. 例如 `11:07:31 AM`。For example, `11:07:31 AM`.| |`Short Time` 或 `t``Short Time` or `t`|显示使用当前区域性的短时间格式的时间。Displays a time using your current culture's short time format. 例如 `11:07 AM`。For example, `11:07 AM`.

`t`字符显示`AM`或`PM`针对使用用户定义的时间格式的 12 小时制的区域设置的值。The `t` character displays `AM` or `PM` values for locales that use a 12-hour clock in a user-defined time format.| |`f`|显示的长日期和短时间根据当前区域性的格式。Displays the long date and short time according to your current culture's format. 例如 `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07 AM`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07 AM`.| |`F`|显示的长日期和长时间根据当前区域性的格式。Displays the long date and long time according to your current culture's format. 例如 `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07:31 AM`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07:31 AM`.| |`g`|显示的短日期和短时间根据当前区域性的格式。Displays the short date and short time according to your current culture's format. 例如 `3/12/2008 11:07 AM`。For example, `3/12/2008 11:07 AM`.| |`M`, `m``M`, `m`|显示月份和日期的日期。Displays the month and the day of a date. 例如 `March 12`。For example, `March 12`.

`M`字符显示月份中的用户定义的日期格式。The `M` character displays the month in a user-defined date format. `m`字符中的用户定义的时间格式显示分钟。The `m` character displays the minutes in a user-defined time format.| |`R`, `r``R`, `r`|将根据日期格式化属性。Formats the date according to the property. 例如 `Wed, 12 Mar 2008 11:07:31 GMT`。For example, `Wed, 12 Mar 2008 11:07:31 GMT`. 带有格式的日期不进行调整的日期和时间值。The formatted date does not adjust the value of the date and time. 你必须调整到格林威治标准时间的日期/时间值，然后再调`Format`函数。You must adjust the Date/Time value to GMT before calling the `Format` function.| |`s`|设置格式的日期和时间为可排序的索引。Formats the date and time as a sortable index. 例如 `2008-03-12T11:07:31`。For example, `2008-03-12T11:07:31`.

`s`字符中的用户定义的时间格式显示秒钟。The `s` character displays the seconds in a user-defined time format.| |`u`|设置格式的日期和时间为 GMT 可排序索引。Formats the date and time as a GMT sortable index. 例如 `2008-03-12 11:07:31Z`。For example, `2008-03-12 11:07:31Z`.| |`U`|设置格式的日期和时间的长日期和长时间为 GMT。Formats the date and time with the long date and long time as GMT. 例如 `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 6:07:31 PM`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 6:07:31 PM`.| |`Y`, `y``Y`, `y`|设置格式的日期的年份和月份。Formats the date as the year and month. 例如 `March, 2008`。For example, `March, 2008`.

`Y`和`y`字符中的用户定义的日期格式显示年份。The `Y` and `y` characters display the year in a user-defined date format.| 有关应用程序的当前区域性信息的详细信息，请参阅[如何区域性影响字符串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information about the application's current culture information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). ## 用户定义的日期/时间格式User-Defined Date/Time Formats 下表显示了可用于创建用户定义的日期/时间格式的字符。The following table shows characters you can use to create user-defined date/time formats. 与不同在早期版本的 Visual Basic 中，这些格式字符进行区分大小写。Unlike in earlier versions of Visual Basic, these format characters are case-sensitive. |字符Character|描述Description| |-|-| |(`:`)(`:`)|时间分隔符。Time separator. 在某些区域设置，可能用其他字符来表示时间分隔符。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the time separator. 时间分隔符用于分隔小时、 分钟和秒为单位设置时间值的格式。The time separator separates hours, minutes, and seconds when time values are formatted. 应用程序的当前区域性值来确定用作时间分隔符在格式化输出中的实际字符。The actual character that is used as the time separator in formatted output is determined by your application's current culture value.| |(`/`)(`/`)|日期分隔符。Date separator. 在某些区域设置，可能用其他字符来表示日期分隔符。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the date separator. 日期分隔符分隔设置日期值格式时日、 月和年。The date separator separates the day, month, and year when date values are formatted. 用作在格式化输出中的日期分隔符的实际字符取决由应用程序的当前区域性。The actual character that is used as the date separator in formatted output is determined by your application's current culture.| |(`%`)(`%`)|用来表示以下字符，应显示为值而不考虑任何尾随字母的单字母格式。Used to indicate that the following character should be read as a single-letter format without regard to any trailing letters. 此外用于表示单个字母格式阅读作为用户定义的格式。Also used to indicate that a single-letter format is read as a user-defined format. 请参阅下面有关其他详细信息。See what follows for additional details.| |`d`|不带前导零数字的形式显示的某天 (例如， `1`)。Displays the day as a number without a leading zero (for example, `1`). 使用`%d`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%d` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`dd`|显示为带前导零的数字的某天 (例如， `01`)。Displays the day as a number with a leading zero (for example, `01`).| |`ddd`|显示的某天的缩写 (例如， `Sun`)。Displays the day as an abbreviation (for example, `Sun`).| |`dddd`|显示的某天作为完整名称 (例如， `Sunday`)。Displays the day as a full name (for example, `Sunday`).| |`M`|显示为不带前导零的数字的月份 (例如，年 1 月表示为`1`)。Displays the month as a number without a leading zero (for example, January is represented as `1`). 使用`%M`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%M` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`MM`|显示为带前导零的数字的月份 (例如， `01/12/01`)。Displays the month as a number with a leading zero (for example, `01/12/01`).| |`MMM`|月份的缩写显示 (例如， `Jan`)。Displays the month as an abbreviation (for example, `Jan`).| |`MMMM`|月份显示为月的完整名称 (例如， `January`)。Displays the month as a full month name (for example, `January`).| |`gg`|显示的段/纪元字符串 (例如， `A.D.`)。Displays the period/era string (for example, `A.D.`).| |`h`|不带前导零使用 12 小时时钟制数字的形式显示的小时 (例如， `1:15:15 PM`)。Displays the hour as a number without leading zeros using the 12-hour clock (for example, `1:15:15 PM`). 使用`%h`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%h` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`hh`|显示为带前导零使用 12 小时制的数字的小时 (例如， `01:15:15 PM`)。Displays the hour as a number with leading zeros using the 12-hour clock (for example, `01:15:15 PM`).| |`H`|不带前导零使用 24 小时制数字的形式显示的小时 (例如， `1:15:15`)。Displays the hour as a number without leading zeros using the 24-hour clock (for example, `1:15:15`). 使用`%H`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%H` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`HH`|显示为带前导零使用 24 小时制的数字的小时 (例如， `01:15:15`)。Displays the hour as a number with leading zeros using the 24-hour clock (for example, `01:15:15`).| |`m`|不带前导零显示为数字的分钟数 (例如， `12:1:15`)。Displays the minute as a number without leading zeros (for example, `12:1:15`). 使用`%m`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%m` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`mm`|分钟显示为带前导零的数字 (例如， `12:01:15`)。Displays the minute as a number with leading zeros (for example, `12:01:15`).| |`s`|不带前导零显示为数字的第二个 (例如， `12:15:5`)。Displays the second as a number without leading zeros (for example, `12:15:5`). 使用`%s`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%s` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`ss`|将第二个显示为带有前导零的数字 (例如， `12:15:05`)。Displays the second as a number with leading zeros (for example, `12:15:05`).| |`f`|显示秒秒的小数部分。Displays fractions of seconds. 例如`ff`显示百分之一秒，而`ffff`显示秒为单位的万分之一。For example `ff` displays hundredths of seconds, whereas `ffff` displays ten-thousandths of seconds. 你可以使用最多为 7`f`用户定义的格式中的符号。You may use up to seven `f` symbols in your user-defined format. 使用`%f`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%f` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`t`|使用 12 小时制，并显示大写`A`对于之前正午的任何一小时显示大写`P`为中午和 11:59 PM 之间的任何一小时Uses the 12-hour clock and displays an uppercase `A` for any hour before noon; displays an uppercase `P` for any hour between noon and 11:59 P.M. 使用`%t`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%t` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`tt`|对于使用 12 小时制的区域设置，显示大写`AM`之前正午的任何一小时一起显示大写`PM`与中午和 11:59 PM 之间的任何一小时For locales that use a 12-hour clock, displays an uppercase `AM` with any hour before noon; displays an uppercase `PM` with any hour between noon and 11:59 P.M.

对于使用 24 小时制的区域设置，会显示任何内容。For locales that use a 24-hour clock, displays nothing.| |`y`|显示不带前导零的年数 (0-9)。Displays the year number (0-9) without leading zeros. 使用`%y`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%y` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`yy`|如果适用，请选择以两位数带前导零的数字格式显示年份。Displays the year in two-digit numeric format with a leading zero, if applicable.| |`yyy`|显示四位数字的数字格式中的年份。Displays the year in four-digit numeric format.| |`yyyy`|显示四位数字的数字格式中的年份。Displays the year in four-digit numeric format.| |`z`|显示不带前导零的时区偏移量 (例如， `-8`)。Displays the timezone offset without a leading zero (for example, `-8`). 使用`%z`如果这是用户定义的数字格式中的唯一字符。Use `%z` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`zz`|显示带前导零的时区偏移量 (例如， `-08`)Displays the timezone offset with a leading zero (for example, `-08`)| |`zzz`|显示完整的时区偏移量 (例如， `-08:00`)Displays the full timezone offset (for example, `-08:00`)| ### 旧式代码示例Legacy Code Example 以下是用户定义的日期和时间格式的示例`December 7, 1958, 8:50 PM, 35 seconds`:The following are examples of user-defined date and time formats for `December 7, 1958, 8:50 PM, 35 seconds`: |格式Format|显示Displays| |-|-| |`M/d/yy`|`12/7/58`| |`d-MMM`|`7-Dec`| |`d-MMMM-yy`|`7-December-58`| |`d MMMM`|`7 December`| |`MMMM yy`|`December 58`| |`hh:mm tt`|`08:50 PM`| |`h:mm:ss t`|`8:50:35 P`| |`H:mm`|`20:50`| |`H:mm:ss`|`20:50:35`| |`M/d/yyyy H:mm`|`12/7/1958 20:50`| ### 智能设备的开发人员说明Smart Device Developer Notes 由设备制造商确定设备的最小时间解决方法。The minimum time resolution for a device is determined by the manufacturer of the device. 如果该设备的时间解析度非常低，`f`格式字符，则返回 0 时该设备上运行。If the time resolution for the device is coarse enough, the `f` format character returns 0 when run on that device. ## Examples 此示例演示同时使用 `Format` 格式和用户定义格式格式化值的 `String` 函数的各种用法。This example shows various uses of the `Format` function to format values using both `String` formats and user-defined formats. 对于日期分隔符 (`/`)、时间分隔符 (`:`) 和 AM/PM 指示符（`t` 和 `tt`），系统显示的实际格式化输出取决于代码使用的区域设置。For the date separator (`/`), time separator (`:`), and the AM/PM indicators (`t` and `tt`), the actual formatted output displayed by your system depends on the locale settings the code is using. 当在开发环境中显示时间和日期时，使用代码区域设置的短时间格式和短日期格式。When times and dates are displayed in the development environment, the short time format and short date format of the code locale are used. > [!NOTE] > 对于使用 24 小时制的区域设置，AM/PM 指示符（`t` 和 `tt`）不显示任何内容。For locales that use a 24-hour clock, the AM/PM indicators (`t` and `tt`) display nothing. returns.span: 返回一个表示日期/时间值的字符串表达式。

span.span: Returns a string expression representing a date/time value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Date`数据类型始终包含日期和时间信息。The `Date` data type always contains both date and time information. 为进行类型转换，Visual Basic 将 1/1/1 (1 月 1 年 1) 作为非特定值作为时间的日期和 00:00:00 （午夜） 的非特定值。For purposes of type conversion, Visual Basic considers 1/1/1 (January 1 of the year 1) to be a neutral value for the date, and 00:00:00 (midnight) to be a neutral value for the time. 如果你设置的格式`Date`为日期/时间字符串，值`FormatDateTime`不结果字符串中包括非特定值。If you format a `Date` value as a date/time string, `FormatDateTime` does not include neutral values in the resulting string. 例如，如果转换 #1/1/0001 # 为一个字符串，结果是"9:30:00 AM"; 的 9:30:00取消显示的日期信息。For example, if you convert #1/1/0001 9:30:00# to a string, the result is "9:30:00 AM"; the date information is suppressed. 但是，日期信息是仍然存在于原始`Date`值，并可以使用函数如恢复`DatePart`。However, the date information is still present in the original `Date` value and can be recovered with functions such as `DatePart`. > [!NOTE] > 如果你通过`Expression`自变量作为`String`文本，`FormatDateTime`将根据其解释设置你的应用程序。If you pass the `Expression` argument as a `String` literal, `FormatDateTime` interprets it according to the setting of your application. 但是，如果将其作为传递`Date`文本，使用格式 #mm/dd/yyyy # 中，因为`FormatDateTime`总是将解释`Date`文本根据英语 （美国） 区域性。However, if you pass it as a `Date` literal, use the format #mm/dd/yyyy#, because `FormatDateTime` always interprets a `Date` literal according to the English (US) culture. 这是必需的因为如果应用程序进行开发和编码使用`Date`从一个文本的区域性，但具有不同区域性的平台上然后执行`Date`无法正确地分析文本。This is necessary because, if an application is developed and coded using `Date` literals from one culture, but is then executed on a platform with a different culture, the `Date` literals could be parsed incorrectly. `NamedFormat`自变量具有以下设置。The `NamedFormat` argument has the following settings. |返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |`DateFormat.GeneralDate`|显示日期和/或时间。Display a date and/or time. 显示为短日期的日期部分。Display a date part as a short date. 如果没有时间部分，则将它显示为长时间。If there is a time part, display it as a long time. 如果存在，将显示这两个部分。If present, both parts display.| |`DateFormat.LongDate`|显示使用你的计算机的区域设置中指定的长日期格式的日期。Display a date using the long date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortDate`|显示使用你的计算机的区域设置中指定的短日期格式的日期。Display a date using the short date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.LongTime`|显示使用你的计算机的区域设置中指定的时间格式的时间。Display a time using the time format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortTime`|显示时间使用 24 小时格式 (hh: mm)。Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm).| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`FormatDateTime`函数。This example demonstrates the use of the `FormatDateTime` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，`InStr`分析字符串时使用函数。Typically, the `InStr` function is used when parsing strings. > [!NOTE] > `InStrB`在以前版本的 Visual Basic 函数返回的字节，而不是字符位置数。The `InStrB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a number of bytes rather than a character position. 它主要用于在双字节字符集 (DBCS) 应用程序中转换字符串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有 Visual Basic 2005 字符串都都以 unicode 格式，和`InStrB`不再受支持。All Visual Basic 2005 strings are in Unicode, and `InStrB` is no longer supported. `Compare` 参数的设置是：The `Compare` argument settings are: |返回的常量Constant|“值”Value|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Binary`|00|执行二进制比较Performs a binary comparison| |`Text`|11|执行文本比较Performs a text comparison| ## Examples 本例使用 `InStr` 函数返回一个字符串在另一个字符串中的第一个匹配项的位置。This example uses the `InStr` function to return the position of the first occurrence of one string within another. remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有之间的奇偶校验`Join`和`Split`函数。There is a parity between the `Join` and `Split` functions. `Join`函数接受一个字符串数组，并将它们联接起来使用分隔符字符串，以返回单个字符串。The `Join` function takes an array of strings and joins them using a delimiter string, to return a single string. `Split`函数接受一个字符串，并将它隔离在分隔符，返回的字符串数组。The `Split` function takes a string and separates it at the delimiter, to return an array of strings. 但是，主要区别在于`Join`可以串联在一起使用任何分隔符字符串，字符串`Split`可以仅使用分隔字符串的单个字符分隔符。However, a key difference is that `Join` can concatenate strings with any delimiter string, `Split` can only separate strings using a single character delimiter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`Join`函数可以从多个字符串创建的列表。The following example demonstrates how to use the `Join` function to create a list from several strings. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有大写的字母都转换为小写;所有小写字母和 nonletter 字符都保持不变。Only uppercase letters are converted to lowercase; all lowercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged. 操作字符串，以便区分大小的更改适用于在其中使用的应用程序的区域设置时，此函数将使用应用程序的区域性信息。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你的应用程序进行安全决策基于比较或大小写更改操作的结果，则该操作，应使用方法，并传入或为`comparisonType`自变量。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何区域性影响字符串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). ## Examples 此示例使用`LCase`函数以返回字符串的小写版本。This example uses the `LCase` function to return a lowercase version of a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定中的字符数`str`，使用`Len`函数。To determine the number of characters in `str`, use the `Len` function. 如果在 Windows 窗体应用程序或具有的任何其他类中使用`Left`属性，必须完全限定具有函数`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`。If used in a Windows Forms application, or any other class that has a `Left` property, you must fully qualify the function with `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`. > [!NOTE] > `LeftB`在以前版本的 Visual Basic 函数返回字节，而不是字符的字符串。The `LeftB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters. 它主要用于在双字节字符集 (DBCS) 应用程序中转换字符串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有当前的 Visual Basic 字符串都以 unicode 格式，和`LeftB`不再受支持。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LeftB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Left`函数返回的子字符串给定`String`。This example demonstrates the use of the `Left` function to return a substring of a given `String`. 中具有的类`Left`属性，它可能需要完全限定`Left`函数。In a class that has a `Left` property, it may be necessary to fully qualify the `Left` function. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用用户定义的类型和`Object`变量，`Len`函数返回时将写入的文件的大小`FilePut`函数。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它将返回字符串的长度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他类型，它会返回对象的大小，因为它将写入到的文件`FilePut`函数。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于对象，以写入时指示的大小的字符串，以字节为单位中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函数使用`VBFixedString`属性，如果可用，在确定大`Object`变量。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函数可能不能确定实际所需的用户定义数据类型中的可变长度字符串使用的存储字节数。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`在早期版本的 Visual Basic 的函数返回一个字符串，而不是字符的字节数。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它主要用于在双字节字符集 (DBCS) 应用程序中转换字符串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有当前的 Visual Basic 字符串都以 unicode 格式，和`LenB`不再受支持。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智能设备的开发人员说明Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函数仅接受`String`和`Object`作为参数的变量。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它将返回的长度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果参数为 NULL`Object`引用，该函数将返回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他类型，将引发异常。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 本例使用 `Len` 返回字符串中的字符数。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用用户定义的类型和`Object`变量，`Len`函数返回时将写入的文件的大小`FilePut`函数。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它将返回字符串的长度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他类型，它会返回对象的大小，因为它将写入到的文件`FilePut`函数。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`特性可以应用于对象，以写入时指示的大小的字符串，以字节为单位中的 string 字段到磁盘。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函数使用`VBFixedString`属性，如果可用，在确定大`Object`变量。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函数可能不能确定实际所需的用户定义数据类型中的可变长度字符串使用的存储字节数。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`在早期版本的 Visual Basic 的函数返回一个字符串，而不是字符的字节数。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它主要用于在双字节字符集 (DBCS) 应用程序中转换字符串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有当前的 Visual Basic 字符串都以 unicode 格式，和`LenB`不再受支持。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智能设备的开发人员说明Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函数仅接受`String`和`Object`作为参数的变量。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它将返回的长度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果参数为 NULL`Object`引用，该函数将返回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他类型，将引发异常。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 本例使用 `Len` 返回字符串中的字符数。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

智能设备的开发人员说明Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函数仅接受`String`和`Object`作为参数的变量。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它将返回的长度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果参数为 NULL`Object`引用，该函数将返回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他类型，将引发异常。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 本例使用 `Len` 返回字符串中的字符数。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

智能设备的开发人员说明Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函数仅接受`String`和`Object`作为参数的变量。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它将返回的长度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果参数为 NULL`Object`引用，该函数将返回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`包含任何其他类型，将引发异常。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 本例使用 `Len` 返回字符串中的字符数。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定中的字符数`str`，使用`Len`函数。To determine the number of characters in `str`, use the `Len` function. Visual Basic 具有`Mid`函数和`Mid`语句。Visual Basic has a `Mid` function and a `Mid` statement. 这些元素都指定数量的字符在字符串中，操作但`Mid`函数将返回字符，而`Mid`语句替换字符。These elements both operate on a specified number of characters in a string, but the `Mid` function returns the characters while the `Mid` statement replaces the characters. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Mid 语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/mid-statement.md)。For more information, see [Mid Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/mid-statement.md). > [!NOTE] > `MidB`在以前版本的 Visual Basic 函数返回字节，而不是字符的字符串。The `MidB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters. 它主要用于在双字节字符集 (DBCS) 应用程序中转换字符串。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有 Visual Basic 字符串都都以 unicode 格式，和`MidB`不再受支持。All Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `MidB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 此示例中的最后一行对 `Mid` 函数使用此重载以返回字符串中第 5 个字符之后的字符（包括第 5 个字符）。The last line in this example uses this overload of the `Mid` function to return the fifth and subsequent characters from a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，或当`Limit`等于-1，`Split`函数拆分输入的字符串中的分隔符字符串中，每个匹配项，并返回数组中的子字符串。By default, or when `Limit` equals -1, the `Split` function splits the input string at every occurrence of the delimiter string, and returns the substrings in an array. 当`Limit`参数大于零，`Split`函数将在第一个字符串拆分`Limit`的分隔符，则为-1 匹配项并返回包含结果的子字符串的数组。When the `Limit` parameter is greater than zero, the `Split` function splits the string at the first `Limit`-1 occurrences of the delimiter, and returns an array with the resulting substrings. 例如，`Split("a:b:c", ":")`返回数组，数组`{"a", "b", "c"}`，虽然`Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)`返回数组，数组`{"a", "b:c"}`。For example, `Split("a:b:c", ":")` returns the array `{"a", "b", "c"}`, while `Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)` returns the array `{"a", "b:c"}`. 当`Split`函数遇到在行中，两个分隔符或的开头或字符串末尾的分隔符，它会将其解析为围绕一个空字符串 ("")。When the `Split` function encounters two delimiters in a row, or a delimiter at the beginning or end of the string, it interprets them as surrounding an empty string (""). 例如，`Split("xx", "x")`返回数组，其中包含三个空字符串： 之一开头的字符串和"x"，第二个介于两个"x"字符串，第一个和最后一个"x"和字符串的末尾之间的一个。For example, `Split("xx", "x")` returns the array containing three empty strings: one from between the beginning of the string and the first "x", one from between the two "x" strings, and one from between the last "x" and the end of the string. 此表说明了如何可选`Delimiter`， `Limit`，和`Compare`参数可以更改的行为`Split`函数。This table demonstrates how the optional `Delimiter`, `Limit`, and `Compare` parameters can change the behavior of the `Split` function. |拆分调用Split Call|返回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Split("42, 12, 19")`|{"42," , "12," , "19"}{"42," , "12," , "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ")`|{"42", "12", "19"}{"42", "12", "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ", 2)`|{"42", "12, 19"}{"42", "12, 19"}| |`Split("192.168.0.1", ".")`|{"192", "168", "0", "1"}{"192", "168", "0", "1"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ")`|{"Alice 和 Bob"}{"Alice and Bob"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ", ,CompareMethod.Text)`|{"Alice"，"Bob"}{"Alice", "Bob"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",1)`|{"someone@example.com"}{"someone@example.com"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",2)`|{"someone"，"example.com"}{"someone", "example.com"}| `Compare`自变量可以具有下列值。The `Compare` argument can have the following values. |返回的常量Constant|描述Description|“值”Value| |-|-|-| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|执行二进制比较Performs a binary comparison|00| |`CompareMethod.Text`|执行文本比较Performs a textual comparison|11| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将字符串的空格处拆分。The following example demonstrates how to split a string at its spaces. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#13)] 下面的示例演示如何拆分有行中的多个分隔符的字符串，并筛选出的空字符串。The following example demonstrates how to split strings with multiple delimiters in a row and filter out the empty strings. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对字符串进行比较的第一个字符开头的字母数字排序值。The strings are compared by alphanumeric sort values beginning with the first character. 有关二进制比较、 文本比较和排序顺序的进一步信息，请参阅[选项比较语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md)。For further information on binary comparisons, textual comparisons, and sort order, see [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md). `Compare` 参数的设置是：The `Compare` argument settings are: |返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |`Binary`|执行的二进制比较，基于派生自字符的内部二进制表示的排序顺序。Performs a binary comparison, based on a sort order derived from the internal binary representations of the characters.| |`Text`|执行文本比较，基于由你的系统的不区分大小写的文本排序顺序`LocaleID`值。Performs a text comparison, based on a case-insensitive text sort order determined by your system's `LocaleID` value.| ## Examples 此示例使用`StrComp`函数以返回字符串比较的结果。This example uses the `StrComp` function to return the results of a string comparison. remarks.format: ## Remarks 常量`VbStrConv.Wide`， `VbStrConv.Narrow`， `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`， `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`， `VbStrConv.Katakana`，和`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可能导致运行时错误时使用在区域设置中，不应用它们，但并非总是： 常量`VbStrConv.Katakana`和`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可用于非日语系统中安装了日语语言包。The constants `VbStrConv.Wide`, `VbStrConv.Narrow`, `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`, `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`, `VbStrConv.Katakana`, and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can cause run-time errors when used in locales where they do not apply, but not always: the constants `VbStrConv.Katakana` and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can be used in a non-Japanese system with the Japanese Language Pack installed. 此外，使用的常量`VbStrConv.Wide`和`VbStrConv.Narrow`与东亚语言安装支持在任何系统上。In addition, use of the constants `VbStrConv.Wide` and `VbStrConv.Narrow` is supported on any system with an East Asian language installed. 操作字符串，以便区分大小的更改适用于在其中使用的应用程序的区域设置时，此函数将使用应用程序的区域性信息。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你的应用程序进行安全决策基于比较或大小写更改操作的结果，则该操作，应使用方法，并传入或为`comparisonType`自变量。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何区域性影响字符串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). `Conversion` 参数的设置是：The `Conversion` argument settings are: |枚举成员Enumeration member|描述Description| |-|-| |`VbStrConv.None`|不执行任何转换Performs no conversion| |`VbStrConv.LinguisticCasing`|使用大小写，而不是文件系统 （默认值） 的语言规则。Uses linguistic rules for casing, rather than File System (default). 有效，且`VbStrConv.UpperCase`和`VbStrConv.LowerCase`仅。Valid with `VbStrConv.UpperCase` and `VbStrConv.LowerCase` only.| |`VbStrConv.UpperCase`|将字符串转换为大写字符。Converts the string to uppercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.LowerCase`|将字符串转换为小写字符。Converts the string to lowercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.ProperCase`|将转换为大写的字符串中的每个单词的第一个字母。Converts the first letter of every word in string to uppercase.| |`VbStrConv.Wide` \*`VbStrConv.Wide` \*|将窄 （半角） 中为双字节 （全角） 个字符的字符串的字符转换。Converts narrow (half-width) characters in the string to wide (full-width) characters. [!INCLUDE[vbstrconv-wide](~/includes/vbstrconv-wide-md.md)]| |`VbStrConv.Narrow` \*`VbStrConv.Narrow` \*|将双字节 （全角） 中要缩小范围 （半角） 字符的字符串的字符转换。Converts wide (full-width) characters in the string to narrow (half-width) characters.| |`VbStrConv.Katakana` **`VbStrConv.Katakana` **|将字符串中的平假名字符转换为片假名字符。Converts Hiragana characters in the string to Katakana characters.| |`VbStrConv.Hiragana` **`VbStrConv.Hiragana` **|将字符串中片假名字符的转换为平假名字符。Converts Katakana characters in the string to Hiragana characters.| |`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` \*`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` \*|将繁体中文字符转换为简体中文。Converts Traditional Chinese characters to Simplified Chinese.| |`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` \*`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` \*|将简体中文字符转换为繁体中文。Converts Simplified Chinese characters to Traditional Chinese.| \* 适用于亚洲的区域设置。\* Applies to Asian locales. ** 仅适用于日本。** Applies to Japan only. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 公共语言运行时中指定了这些常量。These constants are specified in the .NET Framework common language runtime. 因此，它们可任意位置的实际值替换代码中。As a result, they can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values. 可以结合使用大多数 (例如， `UpperCase + Wide`)，除非它们互相排斥的方式 (例如， `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`)。Most can be combined (for example, `UpperCase + Wide`), except when they are mutually exclusive (for example, `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`). 以下是正确的大小写的有效词分隔符： Null (`Chr$(0)`)，水平制表符 (`Chr$(9)`)，换行符 (`Chr$(10)`)，垂直制表符 (`Chr$(11)`)，换页符 (`Chr$(12)`)，回车符 (`Chr$(13)`)，空间 （单字节字符集） (`Chr$(32)`)。The following are valid word separators for proper casing: Null (`Chr$(0)`), horizontal tab (`Chr$(9)`), line feed (`Chr$(10)`), vertical tab (`Chr$(11)`), form feed (`Chr$(12)`), carriage return (`Chr$(13)`), space (single-byte character set) (`Chr$(32)`). 空格，这可以是 full 或半角的实际值因国家/地区对于东亚区域性而异。The actual value for a space, which can be full or half width, varies by country/region for East Asian cultures. ## Examples 此示例将文本转换为所有小写字母。This example converts text into all lowercase letters. span.span: Returns a string or character containing the specified string converted to uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 小写字母都转换为大写;所有大写字母和 nonletter 字符都保持不变。Only lowercase letters are converted to uppercase; all uppercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged. 操作字符串，以便区分大小的更改适用于在其中使用的应用程序的区域设置时，此函数将使用应用程序的区域性信息。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你的应用程序进行安全决策基于比较或大小写更改操作的结果，则该操作，应使用方法，并传入或为`comparisonType`自变量。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何区域性影响字符串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). ## Examples 本例使用 `UCase` 函数返回字符串的大写版本。This example uses the `UCase` function to return an uppercase version of a string.
